label: uncl8249
comment: Code specifying the status of equipment.

values.label: Continental
values.comment: The equipment is or will be moving across a continent on an intermodal or multimodal basis.

values.label: Export
values.comment: Transport equipment to be exported on a marine vessel.

values.label: Import
values.comment: Transport equipment to be imported on a marine vessel.

values.label: Remain on board
values.comment: Transport equipment arriving on a marine vessel is to remain on board.

values.label: Shifter
values.comment: Transport equipment is to be shifted from one stowage location on a marine vessel to another on the same vessel.

values.label: Transhipment
values.comment: Transport equipment is to be transferred from one marine vessel to another.

values.label: Shortlanded
values.comment: Transport equipment notified to arrive which did not arrive on the means of transport.

values.label: Overlanded
values.comment: Transport equipment not notified to arrive but which did arrive on the means of transport.

values.label: Domestic
values.comment: Transport equipment is used in domestic service.

values.label: Positioning
values.comment: Equipment is being transported for positioning purposes.

values.label: Delivery
values.comment: Equipment is being delivered.

values.label: Redelivery
values.comment: Equipment is being redelivered.

values.label: Repair
values.comment: The equipment is for repair.

values.label: Reloader
values.comment: Transport equipment to be discharged and subsequently reloaded on the same means of transport but in a different stowage location.

values.label: Returned
values.comment: The equipment is returned.

values.label: Dropped off
values.comment: The equipment is dropped off.

values.label: Cross terminal transshipment
values.comment: The transport equipment that is unloaded will be loaded in another vessel at another terminal in the same port.

values.label: Booking confirmed
values.comment: Notification of the confirmation of booking of a transport equipment.

values.label: Inspected at terminal gate
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment has undergone a terminal gate inspection.

values.label: Arrived at offloading location
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment arrived at the offloading location.

values.label: Departed from loading location.
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment departed from the loading location.

values.label: Loaded
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment has been loaded.

values.label: Unloaded
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment has been unloaded.

values.label: Intra-terminal movement
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment has been subject to an intra-terminal movement.

values.label: Stuffing ordered
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment has been ordered to be stuffed.

values.label: Stripping ordered
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment has been ordered to be stripped.

values.label: Stuffing confirmed
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment has been confirmed as stuffed.

values.label: Stripping confirmed
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment has been confirmed as stripped.

values.label: Sent for heavy repair
values.comment: Notification that a transport equipment has been sent for heavy repair.

values.label: Replaced
values.comment: One piece of transport equipment replaced by another during operations.

values.label: Empty
values.comment: Empty transport equipment.

values.label: Full
values.comment: Full transport equipment.
